file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-30-27-06 - REAR FUSELAGE I - BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT TOP - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL REAR FUSELAGE I - BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT TOP - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the rear fuselage I - baggage compartment top for general condition. B. Related Zones: 273/274. C. (Applicable to EMB-145 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 20793.0 thru STA X = 25581.0. (Applicable to EMB-135 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 17253.0 thru STA X = 22041.0. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY REAR FUSELAGE I - BAGGAGE COM- ALL 05-30-27-200-801-A ♦ PARTMENT TOP - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-30-27 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-30-27-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. REAR FUSELAGE I - BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT TOP - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 53-Z273-213-002-A00. (2) You must do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of rear fuselage I, at zones 273/274, within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the external visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300 LIGHT DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300 HEAVY DIRT - SERVICING C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Rear fuselage I - baggage compartment 1 Does the task top I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. (2) If necessary, clean the inspection area (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300) or (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300) as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-27 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. External General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the fuselage zone for loose rivets, skin deformation, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 601). (2) Examine the fuselage skin longitudinal splices for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 601). (3) Examine the fuselage skin circumferential splices for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, erosion, corrosion, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 601). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-30-27 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
